name: onTopCrates Play On Browser Edition
description:
To lazy to download this game on your phone? try it on webbrowser instead.

It´s a puzzlegame there you shall help Bob to get to the ground without follow off the edges. It´s done by destroy the crates under him. 

22 diffrent levels!

GameControllers: With the mouse click on the crates to destroy them. 

Left & Right ArrowKeys to change cameraview.

Check out this game in android-phone version at https://dilligaf-420.itch.io/ontopcrates

Everything is free but you can donate a dollar to a poor dev like me if you want to. Share to your friends, and enimes.
